SETTING.name: Button Style
SETTING.hint: Change the style of the default button on roll dialogs
SETTING.label: Configure Style

wide.label: Widen Default Button
wide.hint: Make the default button wider to emphasize which button to click.

color.label: Default Button Color
color.hint: Changes the color of the default button on roll dialogs.

buttonColor.label: Button Color
buttonColor.hint: The background color of the default button.

textColor.label: Text Color
textColor.hint: The text color of the default button. Leave blank to not change it.

adv-reminder.ShowSources.Name: Show Sources of Adv/Dis/Crit
adv-reminder.ShowSources.Hint: If an active effect determines adv/dis/crit on a roll, show its name as a message in the dialog

adv-reminder.UpdateStatusEffects.Name: Enable Condition Effects
adv-reminder.UpdateStatusEffects.Hint: Apply adv/dis/crit with the system's conditions (e.g. apply disadvantage to attacks when Poisoned). Not recommended if you are using another module to modify or replace the status effects.
